languages.text: "Хротко, ты приговариваешься к смерти за саботаж, клевету и ересь. Мастер дисциплины, исполните приговор".
"Hrotko, for your crimes of sabotage, slander, and heresy, I hereby condemn you to death. Master-at-Arms, carry out the sentence."
languages.original_text: "Хротко, ты приговариваешься к смерти за саботаж, клевету и ересь. Мастер дисциплины, исполните приговор".

traits.locale_text: "Officer Hrotko, for your crimes of sabotage, slander, and heresy, I hereby condemn you to death. Master-at-Arms, carry out the sentence."
"Officer Hrotko, for your crimes of sabotage, slander, and heresy, I hereby condemn you to death. Master-at-Arms, carry out the sentence."
"Hrotko, for your crimes of sabotage, slander, and heresy, I hereby condemn you to death. Master-at-Arms, carry out the sentence."
"Officer Hrotko, for your crimes of sabotage, slander, and heresy, I hereby condemn you to death. Master-at-Arms, carry out the sentence."
"Hrotko, for your crimes of sabotage, slander, and heresy, I hereby condemn you to death. Master-at-Arms, carry out the sentence."
"Hrotko, for your crimes of sabotage, slander, and heresy, I hereby condemn you to death. Master-at-Arms, carry out the sentence."
"Hrotko, for your crimes of sabotage, slander, and heresy, I hereby condemn you to death. Master-at-Arms, carry out the sentence."

languages.text: « Hrotko, je vous condamne à mort pour crimes de sabotage, diffamation et hérésie. Capitaine d'armes, exécutez la sentence. »
languages.original_text: "Hrotko, for your crimes of sabotage, slander, and heresy, I hereby condemn you to death. Master-at-Arms, carry out the sentence."

traits.locale_text: « Officier Hrotko, je vous condamne à mort pour crimes de sabotage, diffamation et hérésie. Capitaine d'armes, veuillez exécuter la sentence immédiatement. »

languages.text: «Hrotko, por los cargos de sabotaje, difamación y herejía, le condeno a muerte. Maestra de armas, ejecute la sentencia».
languages.original_text: "Hrotko, for your crimes of sabotage, slander, and heresy, I hereby condemn you to death. Master-at-Arms, carry out the sentence."

traits.locale_text: «Agente Hrotko, por los cargos de sabotaje, difamación y herejía, le condeno a muerte. Maestra de armas, ejecute la sentencia».

languages.text: “赫洛卡，你犯下了破坏、诽谤与异端罪行，我在此判处你死刑。戒律大师，执行死刑。”
languages.original_text: "Hrotko, for your crimes of sabotage, slander, and heresy, I hereby condemn you to death. Master-at-Arms, carry out the sentence."

traits.locale_text: “赫洛卡军官，你犯下了破坏、诽谤与异端罪行，我在此判处你死刑。戒律大师，执行死刑。”

languages.text: 「フロトコ中隊長、お前の妨害行為、中傷、異端の罪により、ここにて死刑を宣告する。マスター・アット・アームズ、刑を執行せよ」
languages.original_text: "Hrotko, for your crimes of sabotage, slander, and heresy, I hereby condemn you to death. Master-at-Arms, carry out the sentence."

traits.locale_text: 「フロトコ巡査、あなたの妨害行為、誹謗中傷、異端の罪により、ここにて死刑を宣告する。マスター・アット・アームズ、宣告を実行せよ」

languages.text: "Hrotko, für Eure Verbrechen der Sabotage, des Rufmords und der Ketzerei verurteile ich Euch hiermit zum Tode. Waffenmeisterin, vollstreckt die Strafe."
languages.original_text: "Hrotko, for your crimes of sabotage, slander, and heresy, I hereby condemn you to death. Master-at-Arms, carry out the sentence."

traits.locale_text: "Offizier Hrotko, für Eure Verbrechen der Sabotage, des Rufmords und der Ketzerei verurteile ich Euch hiermit zum Tode. Master-at-Arms, vollstreckt die Strafe."

languages.text: "Hrotko! Sabotaj, iftira ve kâfirlik suçlarından seni ölüme mahkûm ediyorum. Silahtar, hükmü yerine getir."
languages.original_text: "Hrotko, for your crimes of sabotage, slander, and heresy, I hereby condemn you to death. Master-at-Arms, carry out the sentence."
